text: seongseoui salamdeulgwa usangsungbaejadeul deung-ui bulsinhan jadeul-eun geudaedeul junim-eulobuteo geudaedeul-ege geu eotteon joh-eun geosdo naelyeojigileul wonchi anhnola. hananimkkeseoneun wonhasineun ja-ege geubun-ui jabileul jijeonghasinola. hananimkkeseoneun widaehan eunhyeui soyujasila
